me sandaha wayawena mudala rupiyal laksha 938ki.rupiyal laksha 500k wiyadamin idikerena alawwa bas nawathum pole wada danatamath aarambha kara athi athara alawwa mahajana kridanganaya rupiyal miliyana 164kin aluthwadiya kere.mita amatharawa diwi nanguma yatathe kerena sanwardhana wada sandaha rupiyal miliyana 120k labi athi athara gama nanguma yatathe waya kerena mudala rupiyal miliyana 148ki.ek grama niladhari wasamakata rupiyal laksha 10 bagin grama niladhari wasam 66k thula manmawath kapat kirima ha kuttigal allima, alaweli ha bokku idikirimada me athara sidukere.dambaadeniya shrilani paksha pradhana sanwidhayaka kurunagala disthrik parlimenthu manthri shantha bandara mahathage uthsahaya ha nirdesha matha me siyalu sanwardhana wada sidu kere..

wishwawidyalayanhi siyalu katayuthu dana ganima sandaha usas adhyapana amathi es. bi. disanayaka mahatha me dinawala upakulapathiwarun hamuweyi.ek ek wishwa widyalayanhi upakulapathiwarun samaga sakachcha kota eewata ananya wu suwishesha gatalu dana ganima, samastha wishwa widyala paddhathiye wathman thaththwaya gana purna adhyayanayak kirima me wadapiliwelin amathiwaraya apeksha karayi.upakulapathiwarun pamanak nowa pitadhipathiwarun, adhyayana saha anadhyayana karya mandala samajikayoda sisun ha shishya sangam niyojithayanda hamuwimata amathiwaraya balaporoththu wana bawa usas adhyapana amathyansha prakashakayek kiweya.es. bi. disanayaka mahatha usas adhyapana amathi padawiye wada baraganimen pasu me wana wita wishwa widyala kshethraye wiwidha pudgalayan rasak samaga adahas huwamaru kara gena athayida ema prakashakaya pawasiya.
monama ho kramayakin me kodiwinayen galawenakan lankawa sanwardhanaya wemin pawathina ratak kiyana eken issarahata yanne natha.

wideshiya ha soli aakramana nisa lakdiwa siyaluma jathika, aagamika ha shasthriya katayuthu winashayata pathwu athara, polonnaru rajya pihituwagath mahalu wijayaba rajathuma, rakkhanga deshayen da upasampada bhikshun genwagena lakdiwa parihaniyata pamini upasampadawa nawathath pihituwa sambuddha shasanaya wadidiyunu thaththwayata pathkala athara, maha parakramabahu, nishshankamalla, lilawathi aadi rajya kalawalin pasuwa kalingamagha, chandrabhanu nisa polonnaru purayama athahara dambaadeniyata sinhala rajya genayamata siduwiya.
